mentionedBy.name: Palo Alto Networks Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Fast-moving, born-in-the-cloud competitor that has siphoned market share from Palo Alto's cloud security portfolio, prompting internal restructuring, layoffs, and technical rewrites. Major disruptor in the cloud security space.

mentionedBy.name: Qualys Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Cloud-native security platform with strong vulnerability management capabilities. Agentless approach for comprehensive visibility across multi-cloud environments, one of fastest-growing CNAPP providers.

mentionedBy.name: Rapid7 Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Cloud security platform overlapping with InsightVM's vulnerability management and cloud security posture management capabilities. Agentless cloud-native approach.

mentionedBy.name: Tenable Holdings Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: One of fastest-growing CNAPP providers. Best Tenable VM alternative according to G2. Agentless approach makes deployment almost instant. Without need for agents or sensors, provides comprehensive visibility across multi-cloud environments. Sets apart from Tenable's agent-based model.
